snippet: Two members of Congress, the U.S. Chamber of Commerce and a former Public Citizen president discuss a bill about asbestos claims.
abstract: Letter from Reps Bob Goodlatte and Blake Farenthold comments on June 20 editorial on bill addressing asbestos claims.
lead_paragraph: Two members of Congress, the U.S. Chamber of Commerce and a former Public Citizen president discuss a bill about asbestos claims.

headline.main: The Pros and Cons of an Asbestos Bill
headline.print_headline: The Pros and Cons of an Asbestos Bill
